name: cooler-loans-api
description: API for accessing Cooler Loans data
author: Jem <0x0xjem@gmail.com>

scripts.codegen:bigquery: yarn run codegen:jsonschema && yarn -s jsbq -j tmp/snapshot.jsonschema > bigquery-schemas/snapshot.json && yarn -s jsbq -j tmp/loanSnapshot.jsonschema > bigquery-schemas/loanSnapshot.json && yarn run lint
scripts.codegen:jsonschema: yarn typescript-json-schema src/types/snapshot.ts Snapshot --required -o tmp/snapshot.jsonschema && yarn typescript-json-schema src/types/loanSnapshot.ts LoanSnapshot --required -o tmp/loanSnapshot.jsonschema
scripts.codegen:jsonschema-to-openapi: yarn -s json-schema-to-openapi-schema convert tmp/snapshot.jsonschema > openapi/snapshot.yaml && prettier --write openapi/
scripts.codegen: yarn codegen:graphql && yarn codegen:jsonschema && yarn codegen:jsonschema-to-openapi && yarn lint:fix
